price: U narodu Musaovu ima zajednica ljudi koji se napućuju Istinom i koji prema njoj pravedno sude.
arabic: وَمِن قَوۡمِ مُوسَىٰٓ أُمَّةٞ يَهۡدُونَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ يَعۡدِلُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamin qawmi mūsā ummatun yahdūna bil-ḥaqi wabihi yaʿdilūna
